### Summary table of duplicate profiles

```{r, t_summary_dup_a_details1, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.width = 10}

df_dup_summary <- summarise_df_dup_across({{df}}, df_dup_across)
create_dt_summary_tab(df_dup_summary %>%
  dplyr::select(`Platform` = platform_code, `Profile` = profile_no,
                `Timestamp` = profile_timestamp,
                `Longitude` = lon2, `Latitude` = lat2, n = observation_no_count,
                `Avg(Pres)` = pres_mean, `Avg(Temp)` = temp_mean, `Avg(Psal)` = psal_mean),
  cols = c("Avg(Pres)", "Avg(Temp)", "Avg(Psal)"))

```
